New Records: Brenton Doyle made MLB's single most jaw-dropping throw since last month
Key Match Events: Brenton Doyle threw a laser from the outfield to nail Hicklen at third base for the final out of the game
Post-Match Reflections: The Rockies got their moment against the NL Central-best Brewers on Friday with Doyle delivering a highlight-reel throw
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hicklen, a pinch runner who stole 42 bases in the minors this season, attempted to tag up but was caught out
